alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Autauga, western Elmore, southeastern Chilton, northeastern Lowndes, northwestern Montgomery and southwestern Coosa Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 118 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyle to 6 miles west of Deatsville to near Burnsville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Equality, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Autaugaville, White Hall, Billingsley, Lowndesboro, Autauga County Airport, Titus, Woodcrest, Ten Cedar Estates, Dexter, Lagoon Park, Verbena and Mulberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery
